title: Cryptocurrency Exchanger
description: A cryptocurrency buying and exchanging app created with React.js and Socket.IO.
seoDescription: Cryptocurrency exchanger project featuring React.js, React Router, TypeScript, Socket.IO, and Docker for efficient exchange operations.

title: Domain History Explorer
description: An Electron app which accepts a list of domain names and checks their history in the Web Archive for errors, redirects etc.
seoDescription: The app was created using Electron, I used jQuery to add interactivity to the interface and Bootstrap was used for styling.
